nodes.bodyText: Imho these should be renamed to getUploaderUrl(), getUploaderName(), and getUploaderAvatarUrl() to be consistent with the other Extractors.

Just return "Comments" like in PeerTube (and YouTube in my Page PR), as that function is just pointless. Maybe even do that in CommentsExtractor directly and remove the function from all the comments extractors.
getUrl() should never return an API URL.
Why this indentation? Plus as you said, you shouldn't catch Throwable, and this file isn't even related to your PR
No, I was just browsing with vscode and sent it on irc for bad practise, maybe I pressed without seeing. I'll remove it.
